about_this_biz_business_recommendation.description: Great selection of wines from around the world and also a large section from local wineries. Ice cold beer. Open every day from 9:00 am to 11:00 pm

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Originally opened in 1979 the Fox & Hounds Pub was one of the first few Neighbourhood Pub licenses issued in BC. The pub has served the residents of Aldergrove for many years. The Liquor ( Cold Beer & Wine ) store opened in 1989. The present owners took over the pub in 1993, and have expanded the business with the addition of the 6000 sq ft Liquor store, and in January of 2012 a new restaurant. The pub has remained charming and cozy and as always serves great food.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
The Fox & Hounds Pub and Restaurant is newly renovated English Pub in Aldergrove, BC. We are a Pub, but have added a Restaurant section in our Renovation. So even the young ones are welcome. Great Food, serving Appies, burgers, sandwiches, Steaks and Pizza.  We also serve traditional British favourites like fish and chips,  Steak and Kidney pie and Bangers and Mash. Our Restaurant is open at 9:00 am for breakfast every Saturday and Sunday and holiday Monday.
Large selection of Draft Beer from Domestic to Craft to Famous International brands on tap. We have DJ on  Friday, and Karaoke on Saturday. Once a month we have live music. Join us for the Stanley Cup Playoffs.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: ...hoping to see you soon for great food, fun and entertainment on Saturday nights!
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Some say ...the roundhouse here at Bob's was at one time a 24 HOUR Steak House ...back in the early 60's before the main freeway (Hwy 1) was opened.
That was when Fraser Highway was the main route EAST!

Later in the 60's, it became The Oasis drive-in featuring burgers and fish & chips ~ remember?

In the 70's Louise & Otto ran it as the Roundhouse Restaurant serving great schnitzels and steaks.

Then in the 80's the roundhouse became a fine dining 
establishment run by Bruce & Debbie.

In the 90's the building closed for several years 
until 2000 when it was remodeled by Fritz & Franz from the Bedford House!

Today under the ownership of Bob & Karen, the roundroom is still here for your 
...bringing you a combination of fine dining and fun times!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Featuring an International Cuisine including Steaks * Seafood * Pasta * Rice Bowls * Gourmet Burgers * Schnitzel

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
As you travel through India, your culinary journey takes you from region to region. Each state has its own distinct style of cooking. It's very difficult for a restaurant to offer dishes from every region without jeopardizing quality or authenticity. So as a compromise, most restaurants that serve Indian cuisine tend to stick with one type of food, such as North Indian or South Indian cuisine.

This was the idea that sparked the creation of India's Most Wanted Restaurant. Indians have been historically known to preserve their culture through language, art, and clothing. But what about food? Much of the originality of Indian cuisine has been reduced in terms of Modernity, specifically the spices and vegetables utilised in traditional meals. We at IMW have taken the responsibility on our shoulders to preserve the authenticity and serve our customers the real taste of India in pleasant surroundings. We at India's Most Wanted Restaurant assure you an evening of great food and great fun.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Best modern decor in Langley/Abbotsford. Refined Indian dishes & creative cocktails. Full bar and highly professional service.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Experienced cook; loves to attempt new cuisines and can cook food with a variety of ingredients!
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Need a breakfast, lunch, or catering? We're happy to do it, please call for details!

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Lance graduated from TWU in 2011 with his BBA in Corporate Finance, while playing basketball for the Spartans for five years. Upon graduation, he spent a year in the technology industry before switching gears to a successful career in the power tool industry. Lance was in industrial sales for Milwaukee Electric Tool for three years in Vancouver. With his Business degree and his experience in sales, Lance is ready and keen to make a splash in what he is passionate about: Creating BC Craft Beer. With the guidance of his father and uncle, Lance is equipped with the knowledge of previous successful start-up businesses, and excited to add Trading Post Brewing to the fantastic BC craft beer industry.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Our modern day craft Taphouse & Eatery was born out of a passion for great beer, great food and from our desire to serve the community we call home. As we grow, we look forward to serving the Langley community and sharing our passion for great beer. It is over a glass of that very creation, a labor of our love, where friendships deepen, family ties strengthen and community unites.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: At Trading Post, we pledge to embrace our community, engage our customers, brew great beer, make great food and offer a friendly and inviting atmosphere for our community to gather.
Authentic Indian cuisine & Bar (fully Licensed)

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Wendel's opened in 1997 as a small bookstore with a simple fresh food café. From the start we were welcomed by the community and the word spread about our handmade products and great service. We quickly grew! Today, we employee over 30 people from our community and have deep connections with Fort Langley and have made lifelong friends.

Our bookstore has earned a great reputation as a respected independent store that provides our customers with incredible service and a great selection of quality titles. We have grown into a full fresh food restaurant, catering service and a sister company- Wendel's True Foods- that manufactures certified gluten-free goodies!

attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Mediterranean Inspired Cuisine * Fresh, Local, Seasonal Ingredients  * Family Owned * Fort Langley

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
Katerina, born in Athens, Greece, always knew she would one day open a restaurant.
She grew up enjoying traditional home cooked Greek dishes and fast food was a rare "once -a -year" treat. She then went on to raise her own family with healthy, homemade meals and this dedication is now reflected on the Little Donkey menu.
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Newly opened!

Having lived in Fort Langley for the last 20 years, Katerina could not imagine a better place to realize her lifelong dream to open a little restaurant. She believes in this fast-paced, hectic world, people need to eat well and this led to Little Donkey's simple yet healthy menu.  Designed for convenient take-away or eat-in, the burritos are all scratch made in-house using fresh, local organic or near-organic, non-GMO and sustainably produced ingredients.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: A fusion of traditional and unconventional Burritos using fresh, locally sourced, wholesome ingredients.

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Saba Bistro was previously located on Mavis Avenue in Fort Langley, BC, and operated as both a Café and a Bistro. In January of 2022 the two businesses began operating separately, and we now have the pleasure of serving you as a full service Bistro in our beautiful new space, at 9220 Glover Road, also in Fort Langley, BC. Though the two entities are still very much linked, the expansion has allowed us to give each aspects of the business a space of their own. 
The information on this page refers to our full service BISTRO only- If you are looking for the café, you will find any information at Saba CAFE.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Inspired by the colours and flavours of the Mediterranean and the Middle East, our menu is a carefully crafted balance of local, seasonal flavours. 

Above all our philosophy is as following: there is no greater joy than to come together and enjoy a meal with those you love. All of our dishes are created to be shared and savoured family style, the portions are generous and the drinks are always pouring.

During the week, we offer a curated and locally sourced Brunch menu, from 9:30-12. From 12 onwards a Lunch menu is available only. On Saturday and Sundays Brunch is served all day, and the Lunch menu is not offered.

Discover a world of delicious possibilities at Omni Kitchen + Bar! Whether you love traditional favorites, prefer plant-based delights, or need gluten-free options, our menu caters to you. Come together with friends and family in a welcoming space where every palate is celebrated.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Zagat rated 'Excellent' we are proud to be a part of Chaberton's history in Langley.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Located in South Langley, the Zagat rated Bacchus Bistro is part of local estate winery, Domaine de Chaberton. Serving authentic french bistro cuisine made with local ingredients paired with award winning 100% BC wines from Chaberton and Canoe Cove. Seasonal patio overlooking the vineyard. Combine a winery tour/tasting with a relaxing lunch or dinner. A mini vacation and only 45 minutes from Vancouver.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Gian is the name of our grandfather he started the business in 1940 in India.  After we moved to Canada in 1988 we decided to open up a restaurant in Abbotsford and have not looked back ever since.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Gian's Indian Cuisine was voted one of top two Indian restaurant in all of BC on Urban Spoon, by our customers

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Did you know that Cheryl Krecsy created the Little White House & Co Salon Cafe' because she owns a petite apartment in Paris and wanted to share her love & experience for all things Paris, beautiful sights, music, scents, and most important... taste!  Her daughter Natasha known as the pretty tall blonde is the secret baker of their signature LWH Macaron de Paris:-). Smiles & Hugs
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Little White House & Co was the brainchild of Cheryl Krecsy who created a charming  lifestyle shop and Parisian Cafe' in a 100 year old White Victorian in the village of Fort Langley.   In Paris in the late 1800's the first Salon Cafe' was born, mixing a Parisian Cafe' & Pastry Shop.  It was and is today a place for Ladies & Couples to gather for brunch, lunch and afternoon tea.  "Let us go then, you & I"
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Bonjour, Little White House & Co Salon Cafe' serves Afternoon Tea daily. Seating Times are 10am, 11:30am, 1pm & 2:30pm. Seating time is for 1 hour and 15 minutes. Our Afternoon Tea includes an irresistible collection of elegant finger sandwiches, hot savories, scones, Devonshire creme, raspberry preserve, seasonal fruit & the crowning glory...Sweet Petits of Macaron de Paris, death by chocolates, sweetheart lavender shortbreads, all made in-house, plus LWH creme de la Earl grey tea & other LWH signature beverages. Feel free to view our Afternoon Tea package on our website and enjoy it to go or on the Little White House & Co property.

Please bring cash if you are wanting to leave a tip for your servers. All other payments are card only.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Lovers of cooking and baking. After 10 years of working in the food and beverage industry, we wanted to start over our own thing with one of the smallest carts here, YVR. We are happy when pork butt is being braised, mushrooms are being chopped, and butter is melting. Our dream only gets bigger with food lovers like you
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Cooking, Eating and Laughing is what makes us happy and happier. Ohh, can't miss drinking. We wanted to share what makes us happy with people like you.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: We are offering simple and bold Korean inspired dishes including Rice Bowls with a choice of BBQ Pork, Chili Chicken, Beef Meatball and Vegan Tofu.

Sample fine Chinese cuisine by placing an order at The Dragon House Restaurant in Aldergrove. We're a fully licensed restaurant that serves up only the highest-quality ingredients, made fresh to order. Come taste what you've been missing!

Estate Grill, located at the beautiful Poppy Estate Golf Course, provides delicious casual eats! Great place to grab a cup of coffee to chat with neighbours and friends together or stop by for a hearty breakfast or lunch. Sit back and enjoy the beautiful scenery of the landscaped greens of the golf course! 

We are open Tuesday Til Sunday, 9am-3pm.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Giulia Carbone is the owner of Mangia e Scappa Italian Foods Ltd. Started as a Specialty Italian Grocery, Giulia is an interior designer, who has a passion for cooking and keeping traditional family recipes alive. Mangia e Scappa is a definite stop to enjoy authentic, al forno pizza, handmade breads, pastas, and pastries. Our goal is to help families with busy lifestyles, enjoy healthy, fresh, Southern Italian food. Visit our grocery to take home, take out pizza, or stay in for a true Italian experience in our restaurant.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Started as a Specialty Italian Grocery, in Gasoline Alley, Fort Langley, owner and cook, Giulia Carbone, and Italian Chefs are bringing authentic Italian recipes to the families of the Fort and beyond.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Bringing a taste of Italy to Fort Langley, and the Fraser Valley. From our wood-fired pizza oven, and Italian chefs, you'll swear you've landed in Italy. We offer handmade pasta, al forno pizza, take-out, and a Specialty Italian Grocery and Deli.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Tanglebank Gardens started as a small family business growing perennials and showcasing them in our display gardens.  Over  the years we continued to grow and in 2000 we added the gift store, in 2012 we built Brambles Bistro on site with Daughter Chef Kayla and Executive Chef Sarah at the helm. Daughter and Horticulturalist Lauren grows and maintains the vegetable gardens and orchard as well as the display gardens.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Brambles Bistro specializes in Rustic West Coast farm to plate cuisine.  Our Executive Chef creates delicious breakfast, brunch and lunch creations using our own seasonal fruits and veg grown right outside our back door.  Wander the gardens at Tanglebank  and see for yourself our home grown goodness!  Then pick up some herbs, fruits and flowering plants in the garden store and create your own tasty goodness.  Your Source for Food, Flora and Fun.  Also check out the gift store for unique one of a kind gifts, and Watch for  our Seasonal Christmas Store featuring Handmade German Christmas Ornaments.

Freshly Cooked Pizza 
Authentic Spagehti and Lasagna 
Freshly Made Chicken Wings

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
Once upon a time, there was a little girl who loved to cook and bake for her family and friends. The little girl grew into a young woman, got married, and had three lovely children of her own. She still loved to cook and bake for her little family and their friends.
Years passed and her family had grown. So the woman began to dream. She dreamt of cupcakes and homemade goodness. She dreamt of offering a beautiful place in which people could connect with their families and friends--a place where, through warm smiles and delicious food, she could make a difference in peoples' lives. 
So in 2006, she took a big step and opened a little place she called Tracycakes Bakery Café. And people came. They came for homemade goodness and cupcakes.
attributes.about_this_biz_history: Once upon a time, there was a little girl who loved to cook and bake for her family and friends. The little girl grew into a young woman, got married, and had three lovely children of her own. She still loved to cook and bake for her little family and their friends.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Tracycakes Bakery Cafe is a quaint restaurant and bakery that specializes in more than 40 varieties of signature cupcakes and a scrumptious selection of homemade foods. With locations in Abbotsford and Langley (Murrayville)  the cafes are a welcoming escape from the 'everyday' with their quaint decor.

Life happens over coffee. Come and enjoy a Tracymade latte, High Tea or even a glass of wine with your food. Our menu features made-from-scratch meals for lunch and dinner including soups, salads, sandwiches, and quiche. 

We also offer take out for those on the go! 
At Tracycakes... everyday is an occasion!

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Started in 1999

attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Soft-serve ice cream & signature shakes top the menu at this classic burger & fries fast-food chain.
The Palm Cafe offers a variety of specialty coffees, waffles, avocado toast & sandwiches. We bring a California feel to Abbotsford. We would love to see you.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: Our dedicated team of chefs brings years of experience to the table, ensuring that each dish is a masterpiece of flavour and presentation and a commitment to delivering an exceptional dining experience to all our guests
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Aha is serving traditional Aromatic Hyderabad Biriyani, dosa, quality curries, all day breakfast under one roof for the first time in Lower Mainland !!

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
All About Pho - Langley Branch grand-opened on June 5, 2023, Located in the beautiful city of Langley, All About Pho Langley is a family-owned and neighborhood Vietnamese Restaurant that serves the best Vietnamese food, such as prestigious PHO, and other Vietnamese cuisines. Let us take you on a delicious experience with our healthy and delish meals that are always rich in flavor!

We prepare your meal with only the highest-quality of organic ingredients and hygienic in every step. Whether you are joining us for a quick bite to eat or for dinner with family or friends, our friendly customer service and delicious meals will leave you truly satisfied. Visit All About Pho Langley and enjoy one of our amazing offerings.

Welcome to dine-in, or order by phone or order online for Pickup. View our menu and let us take care of the rest!.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Best beef broth pho in Langley 
Offer bubble tea/boba

Our restaurant specializes in making freshly prepared and healthy Japanese cuisine, which includes a variety of choices from special sushi rolls to teriyaki meals with a homemade secret sauce. If you are ever in a hurry, we can even make your meal ready in under five minutes!

attributes.about_this_biz_history:
On Abbotsford A- List for 16years
Business Excellence Award winner

attributes.about_this_biz_bio: Mucho Burrito is a fresh Mexican grill providing Mexican inspired food that feels good! We provide real good food that tastes good and is made by hand, in house, right in front of you. Visit Mucho Burrito to try our flavourful salsas made with fresh ingredients and traditional fire-roasted cooking techniques. Our guacamole is prepared FRESH with Mucho love on-site daily. Our meats are prepared with real Mexican seasoning that brings the flavour. We grill our meats in house daily, right in front of you! SO THERE YOU GO, MUCHO GOOD, MUCHO FRESH. Mexican-inspired food you love to share with your familia or amigos. (That's family and friends, in case you're really weak at Spanish.)
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Mucho Burrito is a fresh Mexican grill providing Mexican inspired food that feels good! We provide real good food that tastes good and is made by hand, in house, right in front of you. Visit Mucho Burrito to try our flavourful salsas made with fresh ingredients and traditional fire-roasted cooking techniques. Our guacamole is prepared FRESH with Mucho love on-site daily. Our meats are prepared with real Mexican seasoning that brings the flavour. We grill our meats in house daily, right in front of you! SO THERE YOU GO, MUCHO GOOD, MUCHO FRESH. Mexican-inspired food you love to share with your familia or amigos. (That's family and friends, in case you're really weak at Spanish.)
Valley Commons is a way of gathering, of relishing in BC’s mountains and lakes, the sweeping vineyards and abundant orchards. Here, you’re welcomed as family.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: In 1958, two brothers borrowed $600 from their mom to open a pizza place in Wichita, Kansas. They named it Pizza Hut because their sign only had room for eight letters. How profound! Soon, the restaurant grew. Why? The pizza was awesome. The service felt like home. And the customers were treated like family. And we've been delivering that same food and service ever since. For the Love of Pizza Since 1958. From day one, the Carney brothers could look their customers in the eye and promise them the finest pizza in town -- because they knew the farmers who grew the ingredients, and they knew those farmers cared about quality. Since then, our farmers have grown right alongside us, and the ingredients we use are still our highest priority. No one loves pizza more than Pizza Hut. That's why pizza is in our name -- and always will be.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Get 50% off some of your favourite regular priced medium pizzas: Hawaiian, Pepperoni Lover's, Canadian, and Margherita pizzas. Online Only. Limited Time.

Choice Pizza is a leading Canadian-owned pizza based in Aldergrove, BC. We have over 10 years of experience specializing in making different types of meat and vegetarian pizza. Call us today to place an order.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: We have been providing live fire onsite catering  for Weddings, Corporate events, Movie production, Festivals, And large private parties for over 10 years. We pride ourselves on using  local high quality ingriediants when ever possible.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Real Southern live fore BBQ catering. We specializing in Pulled pork, Ribs, Chicken, Brisket, Whole hog and Prime Rib. We bring our Ole Hickory Pits Smoker to your event and cook on site. Corporate Events, Weddings,  Impress your clients by partnering with Porkmafia to make your occasion a success and one that will not be forgotten.

Chances Playtime Abbotsford offers a social gaming experience that is inviting and exciting. Meet your friends, enjoy great food and try your luck at slots, electronic table games or bingo - we've got everything you need for a fun night out. Looking for a FREE meeting/event room for your group or a Fundraiser we are the place to come in the Fraser Valley.

attributes.about_this_biz_history: The little sub shop that began in 1981 in Denver, CO still has the same bold ideas that we had in the beginning. We boldly believe that your food should taste great and that we should use only the highest quality ingredients to create your perfect lunch.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: We are on a mission to craft inventive food with real ingredients that remind you great flavor doesn't have to be fussy. We serve up delicious food made with high-quality, authentic ingredients.

Our secret ingredient is taste. We know what some people think when they hear “gluten-free.” They think great taste and texture go missing along with the gluten. But we can confidently say our baked goods aren’t just good for gluten-free, they’re just good – period. Our recipes use non-GMO ingredients that make celiacs, vegans, folks with a few allergies or wheat sensitivities, or just anyone who loves baked goods, very happy.

Looking for mouth-watering pizza, fresh from the oven? Pizza 24 offers a diverse menu of pizza, wings, salads and garlic bread to Abbotsford's hungry diners. Call us for easy pickup or speedy delivery. There's something on our menu for everybody!

A social enterprise, Taste of Heaven delivers delicious street style food to special functions, job sites and festivals all over Metro Vancouver. Taste of Heaven serves the perfect street fare: locally made gourmet sausages, served on a bun with freshly prepared condiments, locally crafted potato chips and hand-brewed sodas.

Every meal purchased at Taste of Heaven helps NightShift Street Ministries reach out to people battling life's toughest situations: homelessness, addiction, mental illness and poverty.

Now open in Abbotsford. Pizza? Wings? Pasta? Salad? Just a call and have us at your door.
